title: Courgette risotto with pesto and pine nuts
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons butter, divided', '1 shallot, minced', '350g risotto rice (e.g. Arborio or Carnaroli)', '120ml white wine', '1L vegetable stock, warmed', '1 handful pine nuts, about 30g', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '3 medium courgettes, sliced into rounds', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '4 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '1 tablespoon basil pesto']
